resources.string: You're almost there! It'll only take about 90 seconds to restart your device. The update has been available for %1$d days.
You're almost there! It'll only take about 90 seconds to restart your device
Your system update is almost complete.Your device will
Your security update is almost complete.Your device will
Download will continue on mobile data. Data charges may be applicable.
This is used to check, download and install update package
Allow network operations for software updates
Required memory is available for the update
Are you sure you want to turn off smart updates?
Device is not currently in a campaign
When downloading updates via mobile network, additional charges may apply
Do you want to opt-into cellular data option for future downloads too?
Automatically download over cellular and Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi will be used first when available.
Because of its importance, this update will install automatically using mobile data on %1$s
Because of its importance, this update will download automatically using mobile data on %1$s
This update will continue if you go back or close this window
An update is downloading & installing. You can continue using your device.
Looks like your device currently disconnected with internet. Tap the bottom button to try again.
Are you sure you want to stop the installation?
The software download has been interrupted. We’ll keep trying…
Waiting for a data connection to resume background download and installation
Waiting for Wi-Fi or Zero Rated network to resume background download and installation…
Background installation paused due to roaming network, please turn on Wi-Fi to resume background installation.
Waiting for Wi-Fi to resume background download and installation
Your device is no longer receiving updates and may be prone to security risks.

The upgrade attempt has encountered an error due to failed log in.
Please try again later.
Device updates controlled by IT admin

An update is currently being downloaded.
You will be notified when the download is complete.

An unexpected error has occurred.
Device will retry for an update in background.
Unable to check for updates. Try again later.
Please check your internet connection and try again

You need a data connection to check for updates. To check your Wi-Fi connection, go to Settings > Network & internet > Internet > Wi-Fi.
You can also visit motorola.com/systemupdates to see other update options.
Check update is not allowed for Guest profiles

System Update is available in home network only.
Go to Settings > Network & internet > Wi-Fi to setup a connection now.
Update is not possible due to insufficient storage space on the device.

A download of the updates could not be completed at the point.
Please try again.
Checking for updates from time to time keeps your device safe and improves performance
Checking for VAB Validation update status Please wait
System Update is available via Wi-Fi only.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app.
This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won't run unless you update Google Play services.
The update package being downloaded is not compatible with the current software version on the device.
Please check with your Dogfood coordinator.
Installation complete. You'll be prompted to restart your phone (Step %1$d of %2$d)
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
An important system update is available. Please select Install to apply the update. If not, the update will be applied automatically on %1$s.
An important security update is available. Please select Install to apply the update. If not, the update will be applied automatically on %1$s.
This important update will automatically install on %1$s. Make sure you have enough battery for installation.
Because this update is important, your device will install automatically on %1$s. Install time: %2$d minutes
To apply this important update, please restart as soon as possible. If you can't, your device will automatically restart on %1$s.
Because this is an important update, your device will restart automatically on %1$s if you haven't restarted by then.
This update is important. If you can't restart now, your device will restart automatically on %1$s

We found some system issues. We know it's a pain, but you'll need to visit your local service center to get those fixed.
After your phone is fixed, we can continue to run updates on your phone.
Check your Wi-Fi or mobile data connection and try again.

Using Wi-Fi is recommended. Downloading with mobile data or using mobile data while roaming may result in additional charges.
Downloading this software won't impact the operation of your device.
The Software download was deferred on
The update failed to download on
You can continue using your device while the update installs
If you'd like to download this update later, go to Settings > System updates
This download will continue if you go back or close this window
What to know before you download
Wi-Fi is needed to download this update. The download will resume once your connection is restored.
You will not be able to place or receive calls, including emergency calls during reboot!
Connect to Wi-Fi to download this update.
Your device is running the latest available software.
Failed to copy from SD Card location.

Failed to download update. The update package is not available at this time.
No further action is required.
Sorry, there was a problem updating your %1$s. No changes were made. Please try again by going to Settings > System update.
The device can't update now as the call is in progress
A version mismatch has occurred. An update will occur again. If one is available, you will be prompted.

Failed to update. The update version does not match your phone.
Please download the correct version for your phone and try again.
Connectivity has been lost. Please try again by manually checking for updates via Phone settings.
We were not able to download this update. If you'd like to get this update later, please restart your device and then go to Settings > System updates.
We were not able to download this update. If you'd like to get this update later, go to Settings > System updates.

The SD Card was removed. Download process was not completed.
Please re-insert the SD Card and go to Settings > System updates to try again.

Unable to complete the download. There's not enough space on the SD Card.
Free up some space and go to Settings > System updates to try again.
Please insert SD Card to start the download.

Please mount the SD Card to start the download.
Go to Settings > Storage > Mount SD card.

There's not enough space on the SD Card to complete the download.
Please free up %1$s space and go to Settings > System updates to try the download again.

Software update is downloading to SD Card.
Please don't remove the SD Card Until installation is complete.
An error has occurred on the Server. Please try again later.

This update requires %1$s of available storage on your device.
Please delete unused apps or move your photos and videos to another storage device to free up %2$s of space.
Once done, you can go to Settings > System updates to start the update any time.

This update requires %1$s of available storage on your device.
Please delete unused apps or move your photos and videos to another storage device to free up %2$s of space.
This update requires %1$s of available free space on your device. Kindly free up the memory for successful updates
You need to clear %1$s of space before updating. Try deleting unused apps or moving photos & videos to another storage device.
The update could not be properly validated. Please try again.
Please install the update or else the device will install automatically in the next reboot. Make sure the battery level is more than %s
This update will be automatically installed on %1$s.
This is an important update, so please install by %1$s. Otherwise, it will automatically install at a time when your device is least used. Make sure you have enough battery life for installation.
Please install by %1$s. Otherwise, your device will automatically install at a time when it's least used. Install time: %2$d minutes
Please restart by %1$s. Otherwise, your device will automatically restart at a time when it's least used.
If you don't restart by %1$s, your device will automatically restart at a time when it's least used.
The time scheduled for installation has passed. Installation will begin once your device meets the criteria.
The time scheduled for restart has passed. Device will restart once it meets the criteria.
The device can't install now as the call is in progress
The device can't install now as the navigation is on
If you'd like to install this update later, go to Settings > System updates
What to know before you install
Installation is paused due to low battery. Installation will resume when your battery is over 20%.
Download is paused due to low battery. Download will resume when your device is charged.
Please charge your device to at least %s before installing this update
If you dont install this system update soon, you will miss out on important security updates, as well as new features and bug fixes.
As it is an important update, please restart now. Otherwise you will miss out on security updates, as well as new features and bug fixes.
During restart, you will not be able to place or receive calls, including emergency calls.
If you don’t want to restart now, your phone will automatically restart when it becomes inactive.
When the update is complete, we’ll send you a notification
The update will complete after your phone is restarted
We found some system issues. Please visit your service center to fix them

We found some system issues which will prevent you from receiving updates. Please visit your service center to resolve this.
In the meantime, you can continue using your phone as usual.
Choose %1$s account to proceed with system update.
If you'd like to get this update later, go to Settings > System updates.

You won't lose any personal information
Choose how you'd like to download this update:

Checking if the memory is sufficient
Updates to enhance battery life and usage
These enhancements help you capture photos with more precision and detail
The changes help improve data connectivity of the device
These update boost your charging capabilities
The changes help improve overall performance of the device

New monochromatic themes give your phone a sleek look and make your wallpaper pop. Review how apps use and share your data before you give app permissions and make it more accessible with Android 14’s new hearing and vision features.
The changes help improving the performance of the device
Includes improvements and bug fixes that make your phone even more reliable
Includes updates to your Wi-Fi connectivity
Check out all the new features in Android %1$s

What to know before you restart

The device can't reboot now as the call is in progress
The device can't reboot now as the navigation is on

In this step, you will copy the update to system memory. The update will be installed on the next step.
Connect your phone to a power source to ensure you don't run out of battery power.
A new security update is ready to install
Get the latest security update. The update has been pending for %1$d days.
System update will be installed on
Security update will be installed on
As you have enabled Smart Update, your device will automatically install the update on %1$s if you haven't installed by then. Make sure you have enough battery for installation.
As you have enabled Smart Update, your device will restart automatically on %1$s if you haven't restarted by then.
Updates are downloaded and installed automatically when you're connected to Wi-Fi
Updates are downloaded and installed automatically when you're connected to Wi-Fi or using mobile data
Updates are downloaded and installed automatically
For your safety, all important security updates will download automatically whether this feature is on or off
For your safety, all critical updates will download and install automatically whether this feature is on or off.
Keep your device safe and secure with automatic updates
Help your device run safely and efficiently by automatically installing all new security updates and bug fixes.
Smart updates help your device run safely and efficiently. When you turn them on, all new security updates will download automatically. After download, your device will restart at a time you choose.

Smart updates help your device run safely and efficiently. When you turn them on, all new security updates and bug fixes will download automatically. After download, your device will restart and install at a time you choose.

Smart updates help your device run safely and efficiently. When you turn them on, all new security updates will download automatically. After download, your device will restart and install at a time you choose.
Your software has not yet been updated to
Your system is updating to version
Your system has been updated to
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
You'll need to manually update your device when new software is available. Turn on Smart updates to make the process automatic. Tap for more details.
By default, Smart updates run between 1 AM - 3 AM. You can change update times or turn Smart updates off in settings. Tap for more details.
A system update is ready to install
Protect your device from security threats and get the latest Motorola & Android features
Tap here to check memory and proceed.
Experience the new Android. The update has been pending for %1$d days.
Download the new software. The update has been pending for %1$d days.
Update is blocked by admin policy
The software download was canceled on
Update is postponed by admin policy
Congratulations! You've successfully installed Android %1$s. Now you're ready to enjoy a better, smarter, and safer Android experience.
Congratulations! VAB validation update was success
Update has been applied. Confirming that the application was successful… (Step 4 of 6)

Your device could be prone to security risks. Execute the below command for continued updates
adb enable-verity
Your device no longer receives updates
Your device couldn't install this update. Use the Software Upgrade Assistant tool to install. Tap for more info.

There was a problem updating your device. No changes were made. To update your software, you can use the Software Upgrade Assistant tool.
To install the Software Upgrade Assistant tool:
1. Use a USB cable to connect your device to your computer 2. When the USB menu pops up on your device, select the settings icon on the upper right 3. From USB Preferences, select Software installation 4. Switch to your PC and look for the installation wizard 5. Walk through the wizard
Software Upgrade Assistant tool will help you download and install software updates on your device.
This may take a few minutes.
Updates keep your device safe and improve its performance.
There was an update error. No changes have been made.
Are you sure you want to stop installation
